intension: Create a flyer advertising a free trial lesson for a yoga club, emphasizing the benefits of yoga for physical and mental wellbeing.
globalcaption: The image features a woman in a black shirt and black pants, performing a yoga pose on a white background. She is in a squatting position, with her legs crossed and her hands on the ground. The woman appears to be focused and engaged in her yoga practice.
keywords: active, balance, body, concentration, energy, fitness, harmony, health, healthy, pose, position, practice, sport, stretch, wellbeing, woman, yoga, zen, lesson, club, flyer

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a woman in a black shirt and black pants, sitting on the floor in a yoga pose. She is positioned in the center of the frame, with her legs crossed and her hands placed on the floor. The woman appears to be focused and engaged in her yoga practice
